channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Return Refund and Exchange For WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Return Refund and Exchange For WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2022-4047|2024-08-03T01:27:54.233Z -- unknown -- return%20refund%20and%20exchange%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Return Refund and Exchange For WooCommerce WordPress plugin before 4.0.9 does not validate attachment files to be uploaded via an AJAX action available to unauthenticated users, which could allow them to upload arbitrary files such as PHP and lead to RCE
